alert.note: Alert for Goodhue (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:11PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Goodhue and central Pierce Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 411 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles west of Ellsworth, or 7 miles south of River Falls, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ellsworth around 425 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Red Wing and Bay City. This includes U.S. Highway 61 between mile markers 86 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
